definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to juggle with words (dishonestly)/to be a hypocrite and hide behind florid rhetoric
Bacillariophyta, phylum of diatom single-celled phytoplankton

sentences.english: Phaeodactylum tricornutum is one of the harmful red tide algae.
sentences.chinese: 三角褐指藻是极具危害的赤潮藻之一。

sentences.english: The third part is development experiments of antisepsis algicide coatings.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是抗菌藻涂料的研制试验。

sentences.english: Paralytic (shellfish) poisonings are one of the main red tide toxins.
sentences.chinese: 麻痹性贝毒素是其中重要的一类赤潮藻毒素。

sentences.english: New species of Trapa and Najas from Jiangxi, China.
sentences.chinese: 江西菱属和茨藻属的新种。

sentences.english: Thus, algal-bacterial phosphorites are main source of phosphorites.
sentences.chinese: 从而揭示了菌藻生物磷块岩是磷块岩的基本类型。

sentences.english: The level of nitrogenase activity was correlated reciprocally with the content of cell phycocyanin and the light intensity.
sentences.chinese: 酶活的高低与藻蓝素含量和光照强度成反相关。

sentences.english: Microcystis aeruginosa is a kind of toxic cyanobacteria that wide-ranging living in stagnant water.
sentences.chinese: 铜绿微囊藻是一种广泛存在于静水水体中的有毒蓝藻。

sentences.english: Relationship between algal cell density and concentration of microcystin LR were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究藻细胞密度和微囊藻毒素LR浓度的相关关系。

sentences.english: Relationship between algal cell density and concentration of microcystin LR were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究藻细胞密度和微囊藻毒素LR浓度的相关关系。

sentences.english: M. aeruginosa inhibited the feeding rates of the two cladocerans.
sentences.chinese: 有毒微囊藻还可抑制这两种枝角类的滤食率。

sentences.english: In the hunger state, fish may accumulate toxins more easily.
sentences.chinese: 在饥饿状态下，鱼类更容易富集微囊藻毒素。

sentences.english: The control group was only injected alginate.
Different methods were tested to extract phycocyanin from the red alg a Bangia fusco - pururea.
sentences.chinese: 采用多种方法从红毛藻中提取藻蓝蛋白。

sentences.english: The study results of purification of the cyanobacterial toxins are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文还介绍了关于藻毒素净化研究的主要成果。

sentences.english: The extracts of Nostoc commune as plant - growth - accelerator were studied .
sentences.chinese: 研究普通念珠藻的提取物作为植物生长促进剂。

sentences.english: Analysis of amino acids composition of c phycocyanin was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 测定了藻蓝蛋白的氨基酸组成和含量。

definition: water plants/habitat with water source and grass
